nodes.bodyText: Specific exceptions can extend on the CentralClientException
are we continuing offline here? If so shall we log a message to say that?
@hevayo @sameerajayasoma We decided not to log a warning message here right? Pls confirm.
Let's see if how this works. we can add the log as an improvement later.
Yes lets add as an improvement
